Resume.Projects Raw:
PROJECTS DETAILS
LiveSchool Dashboard (www.schools.smartlearning.com)
Duration: October 2017 to …………
Team size: 2
Role: Fronted Development (Designing and Coding)
Technology
Frontend: Angular 5, Typescript, HTML 5, CSS 3, JavaScript, JQuery.
Backend: ASP.NET Core 2.0, Identify Server 4, Oauth 2.0, C#
Database: SQL SERVER
LiveSchool Dashboard is a web API based project. It's core objective is to show the complete report of all clients where running our "SMARTCLASS CTS" product. It shows reports from global summary to end user reports. It has three types of user "management", "admin" and "spok". And every user has specific types of roles.
Architecture : It has three layer of architecture. 1. Frontend layer 2. Web API layer 3. Database layer
Features:
It has graphical representation of view by using chart.js
It has seperate component for specific types of reports.
It has independent services to get data from Web API.
It has token based authentication using identity server 4
Smartclass Educational (www.smartlearning.com)
Duration: June 2017 to July 2017.
Team size: 1
Role: Designer and Coder.
Skill Used: Bootstrap3, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, JQuery.
This is official website of “Smartclass Educational Services Pvt. Ltd.” And it’s static website. It has more than 60+ pages. There are some features which have been used in this website.
Animated Revolution Slider
Light Gallery for images and videos
Front-page pop-up video
ISOTOPS filter in video gallery
Google analytics
Smartclass CTS (Desktop Application)
Duration: Jan 2017 to April 2017.
Team size: 1
Role: Designer and Coder.
Skill Used: HTML5, CSS3.
It’s JavaFx based Desktop application and UI has been designed using HTML5, CSS3 and it has different kind of theme which has been designed using css3.
Englishforever (Internal Project running on localhost)
Duration: Oct 2016 to Dec 2016.
Team size: 1
Role: Designer and Coder.
Skill Used: HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap3, Javascript, Jquery.
It is Admin based template of “englishforever (product of Smartclass Educational)”. It dynamic website which is based .net core. Which is used to content library of englishforever.
STRENGTHS
Good oral, written & presentation skills.
Quick learner with good grasping ability.
Action-oriented and result-focused.
Lead & work as a team in an organized way.
